content: समाहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bring, convey, carry; सर्व एव समाहारि तदा शैलः सहौषधिः <ls>Bk. 15. 107.</ls> {@--2@} To collect' bring together, convene; तत्र स्वयंवरसमाहृतराजलोकं <ls>R. 5. 64</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 63.</ls> {@--3@} To draw, attract. {@--4@} To destroy, annihilate; <ls>Bg. 11. 32.</ls> {@--5@} To complete (as a sacrifice). {@--6@} To return, restore to one's proper place; <ls>Ms. 8. 319.</ls> {@--7@} To curb, restrain. {@--8@} To offer. {@--9@} To contract, abridge.
